data.text: @KevinKe60055655 @LouiseMartinCBC There are no scheduled video updates anymore. Probably won’t see those again. @dennyking is tired of covid. He doesn’t care about Islanders. We’re on our own now.
@LouiseMartinCBC I had a close contact that tested positive and I have been feeling terrible since then but my test came back negative after going to see a doctor they said it was the flu, not covid.

@LouiseMartinCBC It should literally take a keystroke to pull case data from one database into the dashboard or report. There is no excuse for the cases not be reported as they are compiled. I’m practically computer illiterate and I can do it. Can we arrange an intervention?
@Maureen_PEI @InfoPEI They just updated the page to include that info

@Brent_Malloy @LouiseMartinCBC Why not? The superspreaders are the vaccinated. All the breakout were place you needed a vax pass until they stopped announcing it. You can always go and get another booster, put on 10 layers of masks and stay the fawk home if your so scared.
@lloydadams50 @Maureen_PEI @LouiseMartinCBC Four hospitalizations – two of which are due to COVID-19
@InfoPEI @Maureen_PEI @LouiseMartinCBC Does not answer the question, how many COVID cases in hospital currently?
